top.value: Where did your first ever date take place? Did it go well? Was there a second date?

cards.bottom: Drink up if it didn't go well.

top.value: What is a strong or unique boundary of yours in any relationship? Have you always had this boundary, or did something happen that made you set it?

cards.bottom: Drink if nobody else here has this boundary.

top.value: Have you ever gone on a date you didn't really want to go on? What's the story?
What's a red flag in a relationship to you? Have you ever ignored it? What's the biggest red flag you ignored?

cards.bottom: Drink if you ignored a pretty big red flag.

top.value: What's the biggest green flag in a relationship to you?
What is your ideal first date? How expensive is it? What is the weather like? Where is it?
Have you ever cut a date short? Has anyone ever cut a date short on you?

cards.bottom: Drink if someone else ended the date early on you.

top.value: What is your ideal relationship dynamic? Why?
Is any type of relationship dynamic 'natural'? What feels most natural to you?
Is cheating ever forgiveable? What would it take to forgive it?
Should partners share passwords? Do you share passwords with your partners?

cards.bottom: Drink if your significant other has access to your phone.

top.value: Is it ever okay to go through your partner's phone? Have you ever gone through your partner's phone?

cards.bottom: A random person from the group, who has gone through their partner's phone, must give up their phone for 30 seconds for others to look through.

top.value: Can you truly love someone unconditionally? Would you still hold love for someone if they did something absolutely heinous?
Can men and women just be friends? How have you formed this opinion?
How much of an age gap is too much for a relationship? What was your biggest age gap?

cards.bottom: Whoever has had the largest age gap has to spin the punishment wheel.

top.value: What would it take for you to date older by 10 years? 30 years? 50 years? We're talking 2 times a week, and maybe moving in later.

cards.bottom: The person who is most willing to date an 80 year old drinks.

top.value: Is dating easier or harder than it used to be? Explain your reasoning. When was dating the hardest and easiest for you?
Are dating apps ruining romance? Explain your reasoning. What would make them better?

cards.bottom: Drink if you have Tinder.

top.value: Do you use dating apps? Which app is your favorite? When did you start using them?

cards.bottom: If you do, let the group go through your messages with one person of their choosing. Drink if you don't have any matches.

top.value: Is marriage still relevant? Why did you get married, or why would you get married? Was/would a prenup be involved?
How important is financial stability in a relationship? Would you break up with someone if they were becoming a financial burden, but you loved everything else about them?
Should everyone in a relationship have a job? If so, how long would your partner have to be unemployed before you break up with them?
How important is sex in a relationship? How long could you be in a sexless relationship for?

cards.bottom: Drink if you're single.

top.value: Is it morally acceptable to have children without financial stability? How much money should people have before having a child?

cards.bottom: Drink if you have children, or would have a child with less than $1,000,000 in your bank account.

top.value: Is it okay to ghost people? When does it become okay or not okay? How often do you do it?

cards.bottom: If you have ghosted someone in the past 3 months, you must remain absolutely SILENT for 3 rounds, unless it is your turn to speak. Any verbal sounds, you drink.

top.value: Would you scratch an itch for me? What part of the body do you draw the line at?

cards.bottom: If anyone gets whorish, they have to take a drink.

top.value: How soon is too soon for sex? How late is too late? What is the longest amount of time you have waited before having sex with a partner?
How long is too long for a hug? Does it change the more you know someone?

cards.bottom: The person who likes hugging the most has to complete the next 5 card rounds with their arms in their shirt.

top.value: What is your type? How has this changed over the years?

cards.bottom: Drink if you described anyone here who is not your partner.

top.value: Describe your ideal partner. Have you ever dated someone like this? Have you ever met anyone like this?
Have you ever been in love? How do you know? How many times?

cards.bottom: Whoever has been in love the most has to drink.

top.value: If you are single or poly, do you think you need to work on anything before entering a new relationship? If not, why?

cards.bottom: Everyone pick someone in the group who has a significant other. This person has to sit in someone's lap of their partner's choosing.

top.value: Do you have any failed relationships? Explain.

cards.bottom: Everyone gets a treat! Hopefully this wasn't too awkward...

top.value: Describe your first kiss. Did you kiss them again later?

cards.bottom: Whoever didn't kiss their first kiss a second time takes a drink.

top.value: How many people have you kissed? How many people have you intimately held hands with?

cards.bottom: Everyone scoot away from the whores. Herpes is a real threat. WHY DOES EVERYONE ACT LIKE I AM CRAZY FOR THIS!!

top.value: What is the worst date you have ever been on? Did you go on another date with them?
Tell us what you wish you'd said during your last breakup, but didn't.

cards.bottom: Drink if you haven't broken up with anyone.

top.value: Would anything make you hit your partner? What about your friend? Has your partner ever hit you?

cards.bottom: Drink if you've hit your partner before. Someone from the group must hit you if you've been hit by your partner.

top.value: What would or has made you break up with your partner? Have you regretted breaking up with anyone?
Are you interested in having kids? Why or why not? Has this ever changed? Could it change?
Have you ever broken up with someone, then gotten back together? What's the story?
Have you ever wanted to date a friend's ex? Fill us in. Are they still your friend?

cards.bottom: If you have, take a shot.

top.value: Have you ever shot someone down romantically? Did you feel bad? When was the last time?

cards.bottom: Drink if it has been less than a month since you've shot someone down.

top.value: Have you ever done any grand gestures to try and repair a failing relationship or friendship?
When was the last time you spoke to an ex? What was it about? Was there any tension? Why are they your ex?
How many kids is too many kids? How many kids do you plan to have? Who have you met that has way too many kids?

cards.bottom: Drink if you have 3 or more siblings, or want 4 or more kids.

top.value: Have you ever been shot down romantically? What happened?
Tell us what you do to annoy your partner on purpose.
How compatible are we romantically?

cards.bottom: Drink if you are playing with your sibling(s).

top.value: How far are you willing to drive regularly to see a partner? What about a friend?
How soon into a relationship are you comfortable with nudity?
Regardless of whether you want kids, do you think you would be a good parent?
Am I anyone's type here? Could I change anything to become your type?

cards.bottom: Only click on this if nobody says yes.||Oh my... wow. Are they ugly? Are they weird? What's wrong with them? What can they fix?||

top.value: Do you think I'm a dom or a sub? Top or bottom? Do we all know the difference?

cards.bottom: If you have Hinge, you have to awkwardly slide into someone's DM's here.

top.value: Have you ever sent nudes? Would you?

cards.bottom: To those who have, use your phone as a prop to show how you took them.

top.value: Have you ever made porn? Would you ever make porn? What's stopping you?

cards.bottom: Drink if you've never been tested.

cards.bottom: Whoever was the farthest off has to drink.
